meanings.definition: A word, name, or symbol consisting of four letters.
meanings.sent1: The ancient scroll contained mysterious tetragrammatons.
meanings.sent2: In class, we learned about different tetragrammatons in various languages.
meanings.sent3: The detective deciphered the hidden message written in tetragrammatons.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace was adorned with delicate tetragrammatons, symbolizing peace.
meanings.sent5: The magician chanted the powerful tetragrammatons to cast a spell.

meanings.definition: A set of four letters used as a name for God in the Hebrew Bible.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, the priest recited the sacred tetragrammatons.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the significance of the divine tetragrammatons in religious texts.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled when they heard their teacher mispronounce the holy tetragrammatons.
meanings.sent4: The ancient temple was adorned with intricate carvings of the revered tetragrammatons.
meanings.sent5: The choir sang praises using the melodious tetragrammatons.
